sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中醫和印度草藥醫學裏的藥用歷史悠久。

sentences.english: They also take into consideration the difficulty of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭的易度果豔也會斟酌在內。

sentences.english: Studies of blue honeysuckle(Lonicera caerulea L. ) were briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了藍靛果忍冬種質資源的研究進展。

sentences.english: It is just blatantly and brutally LAZY and TIRED.
sentences.chinese: 完全就是喫果果的令人髮指的懶惰和疲乏。

sentences.english: I was late signing up because of my job.
sentences.chinese: 我報名晚了是果爲爾在農息。

sentences.english: The small size fruit phenomenon was unrelated to the contradiction of nutrients supply and demand.
sentences.chinese: 小果現象與樹體營養供需矛盾無關。

sentences.english: It is a cornucopia of riches, symbolized by the overflowing market basket.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個財富的豐饒角，被滿溢出的果菜籃體現。

sentences.english: Strong wind blew off the pineapple guavas .
Moreover, fruit mean weight of blotchy ripening fruit was significantly higher than normal fruit.
sentences.chinese: 而且筋腐果的平均單果重顯著地高於正常果。

sentences.english: I filled my plate with turkey and potatoes and cranberry jello.
sentences.chinese: 我會盛些火雞，土豆和吉勒紅莓果。

sentences.english: It works on my 9-month old baby who suffers from eczema.
sentences.chinese: 我9個月年夜的寶寶得了溼疹，它對他有用果的。

sentences.english: True to my prediction, in the afternoon I ran to the park. There was nothing left but the tender twigs.
sentences.chinese: 果不出所料，下午再跑到公園，只剩嫩枝了。

sentences.english: Will you take my son's mandrakes too?
sentences.chinese: 難道現在你還要把我兒子的多情果也搶去嗎？

sentences.english: The order of variation coefficient of phenotypic were leaf, body size, flower and fruit.
sentences.chinese: 各性狀變異係數的大小次序爲葉＞樹體＞花＞果。
